body_html:
A new commit is pushed. The commit refactors Predictor class into PredictorBase with sub-class Predictor<Context>. The evaluation interface run() now adds a threadsafe parameter with default value false. If it is set to true, we will run the run_net_ in a new workspace.

I will change the title of this PR accordingly.
body_text:
A new commit is pushed. The commit refactors Predictor class into PredictorBase with sub-class Predictor<Context>. The evaluation interface run() now adds a threadsafe parameter with default value false. If it is set to true, we will run the run_net_ in a new workspace.
I will change the title of this PR accordingly.
body:
A new commit is pushed. The commit refactors `Predictor` class into `PredictorBase` with sub-class `Predictor<Context>`. The evaluation interface `run()` now adds a `threadsafe` parameter with default value `false`. If it is set to `true`, we will run the `run_net_` in a new workspace.

I will change the title of this PR accordingly.
